short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a rating system to the High Seas Shipyard and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension to be used in High Seas that will display the following info:

On Shipyard:
- Each projects rating out of 10
- Your Average Doubloons/Hour
- Your Average Rating
- An AI that can generate new ideas

On Shop:
- How many hours you need for an item
- How many hours you *currently* need for an item you can't afford
